title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 14b - Order enlarging conditions of probation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form 14b - Order enlarging conditions of probation

State Regulations

Secs. 410.20, 410.40 C.P.L. FORM 14b
(Order Enlarging

Conditions of Probation)
1/87

At a Criminal Term, Part ________ of the
________ Court of the State of New York, held in and for the County of
________, on the ________ day of ________, 19________. P R E S E N T: Hon. ______
Judge (Justice)
X________X
IN THE MATTER
________, Indictment/Docket

No. ________
Probationer. ORDER
X________X
The ____________ Department of Probation, by

Probation
[County]
officer ________, having applied for an order
pursuant to C.P.L. ยง410.20 to enlarge the conditions of the sentence of
probation, upon the ground that ____________
____________
____________
Now, upon reading and filing the application
of Probation Officer ________in support, and due deliberation having been had
thereon, and it appearing that ____________
____________
____________
it is
ORDERED, that effective as of this day, the
conditions of probation be modified as follows ____________
____________
____________
E N T E R
Dated: ________, 19________
________, New York
______________
Judge (Justice)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, form
14b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
